H7971.def: = causative action by which humans or deities commission one or more agents to go to a certain individual or place in order to perform a certain task

H3733.def: exact meaning unsure; probably: = a young male sheep

H4910.def: = state in which humans are similar in shape, behavior or experience to others

H776.def: = the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land

H4057.def: = area not very suitable for sedentary life and agriculture because of its lack of water; suitable for grazing domestic animals and only inhabited by nomadic tribes and wild animals

H2022.def: = a relatively high elevation of the earth’s surface; generally higher than a {L:hill<SDBH:גִּבְעָה>}

H1323.def: = direct or indirect female offspring of humans or animals, either biologically or through adoption

H6726.def: = mountain; ► that part of {L:Jerusalem<SDBH:יְרוּשָׁלַ͏ִם>} on which the temple was built, also known as a fortress and stronghold, city of {L:David<SDBH:דָּוִד>}, YHWH's dwelling place

H5074.def: = action by which humans or animals move away in haste from a certain place ► in order to escape from a situation that is considered dangerous

H7971.def: = causative action by which humans or deities commission one or more agents to go to a certain individual or place in order to perform a certain task

H7064.def: = structure, made by birds ◄ from twigs, straw, grass, or other materials, ► to lay their eggs and shelter their young; ≈ associated with security

H1323.def: = direct or indirect female offspring of humans or animals, either biologically or through adoption

H4124.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Lot<SDBH:לֹוט>} and one of his daughters; ► regarded as the founder of a nation with the same name

H769.def: = river; ◄ east of the {L:Jordan<SDBH:יַרְדֵּן>}; ► constitutes border between {L:Moab<SDBH:מֹואָב>} and {L:Ammon<SDBH:עַמֹּון>}

H6213.def: = causative action by which human or deities produce an object, either personally or by others on behalf of them

H6415.def: = action by which someone gives a verdict on a case or person in a dispute and ensures that the verdict is implemented, which, ideally, results in relief for the innocent and punishment for the guilty; this can only be done by someone in authority, such as a judge or ruler or even God himself

H7896.def: = action by which individuals or groups of humans place themselves in a certain position or configuration

H3915.def: = the time of day that is characterized by darkness; ≈ associated with sleep, fear, evil, and hardship

H5641.def: = state in which people or objects are in a location where they cannot be readily seen or where danger cannot reach them

H5080.def: = state in which one's hand, which holds an instrument like an axe, is raised ► with the purpose of striking it against another object

H1540.def: = action by which someone takes off his/her clothes, either entirely or in part, ► as a result of which that person becomes naked or improperly dressed, ≈ which is considered a shameful thing to do

H5074.def: = action by which humans or animals move away in haste from a certain place ► in order to escape from a situation that is considered dangerous

H5080.def: = state in which one's hand, which holds an instrument like an axe, is raised ► with the purpose of striking it against another object

H1481.def: = state in which humans live in a place that is not their place of origin or nationality, either permanently or for a substantial period of time

H4124.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Lot<SDBH:לֹוט>} and one of his daughters; ► regarded as the founder of a nation with the same name

H7703.def: = action by which humans or wild animals attack other humans and kill, destroy and steal in the process

H4160.def: = a person who mistreats other people

H656.def: = to be no longer present in a certain location

H7701.def: = action by which humans or wild animals attack other humans and kill, destroy and steal in the process

H3615.def: = process by which an activity comes to full completion

H7429.def: = action by which humans, deities, or animals tread heavily and noisily on people, plants, or objects; ► usually with the purpose of killing, destroying, desecrating, and/or humiliating

H8552.def: = process by which events reach the stage of completion

H776.def: = the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land

H2617.def: = state in which humans or deities are committed towards fulfilling their obligations and show that by their actions; these obligations include responsibilities towards kinspeople, spouses, friends, covenant partners, and people to whom one is indebted as a result of favors received

H3678.def: = large elaborate seat used by people in a position of authority or wealth

H3559.def: = state in which an object is firmly and immovably located in a certain place

H168.def: = construction ◄ made out of cloth or skins ► used as a temporary residence by nomads, soldiers, shepherds, and even as a sanctuary

H1875.def: = action by which deities, humans, or animals make an intensive effort to locate (other) humans, animals, objects, or activities, which often requires them to move from one location to another

H4941.def: = a situation where one party has a dispute with another party, and is looking for a legal ruling in which they receive what they consider to be rightfully theirs

H4106.def: = actions by which deities act without delay

H6664.def: = state in which a weight or measure is correct or accurate, in accordance with a standard

H3427.def: = action by which humans assume a sitting position in a certain location and remain in that position for some time; ≈ sometimes associated with a certain status, role, or common activity

H571.def: = state in which humans and deities are considered worthy of trust, because they are truthful and committed, with an unwavering disposition, which is reflected in their words and actions

H4124.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Lot<SDBH:לֹוט>} and one of his daughters; ► regarded as the founder of a nation with the same name

H1347.def: = dense growth of shrubbery or small trees, habitat of animals

H1341.def: = state in which humans have an elevated status in their own eyes, ≈ which is seen as a negative and undesirable attitude for humans

H1346.def: = state in which a substance increases in volume, which manifests itself in an increasing height

H907.def: = woven material ◄ made from the stems of the flax plant; absorbs perspiration better than many other types of cloth; ► used for production of clothes; worn by priests and supernatural beings; ≈ associated with quality, strength, and coolness

H4124.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Lot<SDBH:לֹוט>} and one of his daughters; ► regarded as the founder of a nation with the same name

H3213.def: = action by which humans utter a high-pitched cry to give expression to an emotion, which is usually grief or distress, but can also be triumph and glee

H1897.def: = causative action by which humans causes other humans or objects to be removed from their place,◄ as if by blowing them away

H809.def: = cake; ◄ made of dried, compressed grapes; ► possibly eaten at festivals and other special ceremonies

H389.def: = particle marking a constituent as representing a limited number of entities

H7709.def: = a piece of land generally uninhabited by human beings, ► sometimes used for farming or pasturing animals

H2809.def: = action by which humans exercise their {L:mind<SDBH:לֵב>} with the purpose of achieving something

H535.def: = state of being unable to function as can be expected; ◄ as a result of destruction, a drought, or God's direct intervention; ► results include weakness, sadness, shame, death, and disintegration, depending on the situation

H1612.def: = a creeping plant, which grows along the ground until it finds a tree or other object to climb, using tendrils

H1167.def: = person exercising authority over people, animals, or inanimate objects in the role of owner, ruler, or husband

H1986.def: = action by which humans or animals deliver a blow to an object with their hands, whether or not with the help of an instrument such as a {L:hammer<SDBH:הַלְמוּת>}, or with their feet

H5060.def: = process or action by which the hand or another part of the body of humans gets in brief contact with an object, whether deliberately or not

H5704.def: particle linking an event to a point in space; = relation indicating that event X ends at point in space Y

H3270.def: = town; ◄ located in {L:Gilead<SDBH:גִּלְעָד>}, territory of {L:Gad<SDBH:גָּד>}; ► former {L:Amorite<SDBH:אֱמֹרִי>} territory; assigned to clan of {L:Merari<SDBH:מְרָרִי>}, tribe of {L:Levi<SDBH:לֵוִי>}; later occupied by {L:Moab<SDBH:מֹואָב>}

H4057.def: = area not very suitable for sedentary life and agriculture because of its lack of water; suitable for grazing domestic animals and only inhabited by nomadic tribes and wild animals

H7976.def:
= young branches springing from 
a plant or tree

H5203.def: = process by which ropes that used to be tightly strung begin to hang loose

H3220.def: = a large and deep body of water which collects in a depression of the land; containing either salt water or fresh water

H1058.def: = action by which someone express his/her grief or sorrow by shedding tears, crying loud and making appropriate gestures, ◄ because of some personal or national calamity, or for a dead person

H3270.def: = town; ◄ located in {L:Gilead<SDBH:גִּלְעָד>}, territory of {L:Gad<SDBH:גָּד>}; ► former {L:Amorite<SDBH:אֱמֹרִי>} territory; assigned to clan of {L:Merari<SDBH:מְרָרִי>}, tribe of {L:Levi<SDBH:לֵוִי>}; later occupied by {L:Moab<SDBH:מֹואָב>}

H1612.def: = a creeping plant, which grows along the ground until it finds a tree or other object to climb, using tendrils

H2809.def: = action by which humans exercise their {L:mind<SDBH:לֵב>} with the purpose of achieving something

H1832.def: = fluid appearing in the eye; ≈ primarily associated with grief and mourning

H1959.def: = action by which humans utter loud expressions of joy

H5307.def: = process by which humans, animals, or objects move from a higher level to a lower level, typically at a high speed and without control

H7019.def: = hot season of the year, opposite of {L:חֹרֶף<SDBH:חֹרֶף>}; ► time when most crops are harvested and preparations are made for the cold season; ≈ sometimes associated with excessive heat and drought, and also with hard work

H8057.def: = state in which humans feel and show great joy

H1524.def: mainly in poetical texts: = state in which humans feel and show great joy

H622.def: = process by which humans come together from different places and form a group for a common purpose, such as for a meeting or for war

H3759.def: = newly ripened grain which has just been harvested and which has not yet been dried for storage or for grinding into flour

H3754.def: = field where {L:grapes<SDBH:עֲנָב>} are cultivated, growing on {L:vines<SDBH:גֶּפֶן>}; typically surrounded by a stone wall, and equipped with a {L:watchtower<SDBH:מִגְדָּל>} and a {L:wine press<SDBH:יֶקֶב>}

H1869.def: = action by which humans or animals move forward by lifting and setting down each foot in turn

H3196.def: = dark red alcoholic liquid; ◄ made out of grapes through the process of fermentation; ► used as beverage, though to be avoided by Nazirites, and by priests when on duty; ≈ associated with joy and well-being, but also with drunkenness and foolishness; used as metaphor for anger, aggressive behavior, and sex{N:001}

H3342.def: = large container; ◄ normally hewn out of stone and part of a winepress; ► where the grape juice is collected

H7673.def: = process by which an activity comes to an end

H1959.def: = action by which humans utter loud expressions of joy

H4578.def: literally =  the bowels or inner parts of a human body; sometimes used collectively to refer to all the internal organs and even the whole being, and sometimes used to refer to a specific part of the human body, for example, the stomach, the heart, the womb, the soul, the breast, the genitals; ≈ associated with emotions such as anguish but also compassion

H1993.def: = action by which humans, animals, or objects produce a variety of sounds, often associated with animals, but also with natural phenomena like the waves of a stormy sea

H4124.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Lot<SDBH:לֹוט>} and one of his daughters; ► regarded as the founder of a nation with the same name

H3658.def: = musical instrument consisting of a sound box ◄ made of wood, out of the ends or sides of which projected two arms; the arms supported a crosspiece; strings descended from the crosspiece over the sound box and the number of strings could vary; ► often used to accompany singing

H4124.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Lot<SDBH:לֹוט>} and one of his daughters; ► regarded as the founder of a nation with the same name

H7200.def: = process or action by which living creatures perceive something, primarily --though not necessarily exclusively-- with their eyes, either as a spontaneous incident or as the result of focusing the eyes on something

H3811.def: = action by which humans spend all their forces on a certain activity

H4720.def: = part of an object that is considered more holy than the rest

H6419.def: = state in which humans regard an event as likely to happen

H3201.def: mostly used in a negated clause; = state in which an activity cannot be carried out, as a result of a lack of skill, strength, or ability of the agent, or other circumstances that make the activity impossible

H834.def: = a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner

H3068.def: = deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

H1696.def: = causative action by which someone exterminates a group of people, either directly or by the hands of someone else

H227.def: = referent pointing to a specific point in time, either in the past or the future

H4124.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Lot<SDBH:לֹוט>} and one of his daughters; ► regarded as the founder of a nation with the same name

H6258.def: = a reference to the actual time when a particular event takes place

H3068.def: = deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

H559.def: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken

H1696.def: = causative action by which someone exterminates a group of people, either directly or by the hands of someone else

H7969.def: = state in which a countable entity is three in number

H7916.def: = state in which animals or objects have been made available to be of service or use to others for a limited amount of time and in return for payment

H4124.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Lot<SDBH:לֹוט>} and one of his daughters; ► regarded as the founder of a nation with the same name

H3519.def: = position of honor; ◄ often as a result of wealth and/or authority

H7227.def: = state in which an object is very large in size

H1995.def: = action by which humans, animals, or objects produce a variety of sounds, sometimes associated with natural phenomena like heavy rain and the waves of a stormy sea

H4592.def: = small quantity of objects or substance

H4213.def: = state in which objects are relatively few in number

H3524.def: = state in which humans, deities or substances have great power and strength
